name: levyTax
rulesOne:
Take 2 Gold for each orthodox capital or town-province you own. 

You do not earn Gold for allied towns or heretical town-provinces.

name: convertReligionsToCatholic
rulesOne:
If there are no Catholic players, gain three Saints. Return your role card to the common pool. Take Good Works equal to the Saved Catholic player who has the least, then subtract two. You may not go negative.

If you have at least one Good Work and are in the top 2 players (or top 3 in a 7-8 player game) for Good Works, take the Saved by Faith and Works Role. Otherwise take the Damned Catholic in a State of Mortal Sin role card.

Change the religion of your capital to Catholic.
rulesTwo: You must be Protestant.

name: convertToProtestantism
rulesOne:
Discard your current role card. If there are any Saved by Faith Alone roles remaining, take that role. Otherwise, take the Damned Protestant Predestined to Hell role card.

Lose all Faith and Saints.

Change the religion of your capital to Protestant.
rulesTwo: You must be Catholic.

name: releaseVassal
rulesOne: Release Province with a town on it as a Principality as your vassal.
rulesTwo: Replace your control marker with a Principality one. Place 2 influence on this Principality; you start its ally. Other Players may influence this Principality, and you may not retake this Principality except through war.
rulesThree: You must own a Province with a town on it.

name: sackMonasteries
rulesOne: Discard your Monasteries token, gain two Gold,
rulesTwo: You must be Protestant.

name: callTheCouncil
displayName: Call a Council of Trent Vote
rulesOne: Trigger a Council of Trent vote.
rulesTwo: You must be Catholic.

name: giftProvince
rulesOne: Gift non-town provinces to Principalities if the provinces are adjacent to the Principality and the same religion as the Principality.
rulesTwo: Gain 1 Diplomatic Influence per gifted province with that Principality.

name: joinLeague
rulesOne: Players saved by Faith and Works may join the Catholic League. They lose 1 Diplomatic Influence from each Protestant Principality they have influence with.
rulesTwo: Players saved by Faith Alone may join the Evangelical League. They lose 1 Diplomatic Influence from each Catholic Principality they have influence with. Players not saved by Faith Alone or by Faith and Works may join either League and lose no Diplomatic Influence upon Joining a League.
rulesThree: Players cannot change or leave Leagues.

name: provideAssistance
rulesOne: Pay Gold (to the bank) for Diplomatic Influence at a rate of 1:1.

name: influencePrince
rulesOne:
Place Influence on any Principality(ies) of your choice, regardless of Religion or allies.

If you have 1 Influence on the Principality per province it has and more Influence than any other Player you ally the Principality. When you ally a Principality, take its Control Marker and add it to your Player Card on the appropriate slot. Another Player may not displace you as the ally unless he surpasses you in Influence. Ties in Influence default to the current controller.

name: spreadFaith
rulesOne: Roll all of your Faith dice. Earn 1 Saint or Reformation Point for each Cross or Crucifix (1-3) you roll. Place all of your successful dice on provinces of your choice, defensively or offensively within their own territory, in a neighboring (adjacent) player-controlled non-capital province, or on a neighboring or allied Principality (but not a neighbor of an ally).
rulesTwo: You must be Protestant or a post Council of Trent Catholic.

name: churchAbuses
rulesOne: Convert every two Faith into a Saint. Left over Faith is lost.
rulesTwo: Your must be Catholic and the Council of Trent must not have concluded.

name: conductDiplomacy
rulesOne:
Pick a player to play the Diplomacy Game with.

Players face each other and count down '3, 2, 1, 'Go!' Simultaneously, Players form either a thumbs up or a finger gun:  If both Players formed a thumbs up, both Player gain 2 Diplomatic Influence.  If one Player formed a thumbs up, while the other formed a finger gun, the Player with the finger gun gains 4 Influence and the other Player gain 0 Influence.  If both Players formed a finger gun, both Players gain 1 Influence. You may not move Influence between Principalities once placed.

name: canonize
rulesOne: Convert 5 Good Works into 1 Saint as many times as you want.
rulesTwo: Your must be Catholic.

name: prayForTheChurch
rulesOne:
Gain Faith Dice:
+1 per Saint
+2 if you adhere to the Emperor's religion
+2 if Saved by Faith and Works
rulesTwo: Your must be Catholic.

name: prayForTheReformation
rulesOne:
Gain Faith Dice:
+5 if Rounds 1-3
+3 Rounds 4-5
+2 if you adhere to the Emperor's religion
+2 if Saved by Faith Alone
rulesTwo: Your must be Protestant.

name: becomeForeignPower
rulesOne: You may become a Foreign Power if you have no provinces or if you have 5 Imperial Power or less during Round 1-3 or you have 15 Imperial Power or less during Round 4-6.
rulesTwo: Choose a Foreign Power hex and place it on the edge of the map. Replace your old province hex with a random Principality. Your Foreign Power is same Religion as your old Principality. Discard all saved and placed Influence but keep every other Influence discarded.
rulesThree: Every round, set your Imperial Power to the round number multiplied by four minus the total value of 2D6. Gain Imperial Power from Provinces gained as normal. You cannot lose your last province.

name: saleOfIndulgences
rulesOne: Gain 1 Gold.
rulesTwo: You must be Catholic and the Council of Trent must have concluded.

name: intercession
rulesOne: Gain 1 Faith per 5 Saints.
rulesTwo: You must be Catholic

name: keepTheFaith
rulesOne: Earn a Faith cube of your faith based on the round number and your total Saints.

name: downWithTheWhore
displayName: Down with the Whore of Babylon
rulesOne: Gain 3 Faith if you are Protestant.
rulesTwo: You must be Protestant and it must be Round 1-3.

name: theJesuitsStrikeBack
rulesOne: Gain 3 Faith.
rulesTwo: You must be Catholic and it must Round 4-6.

name: zeal
rulesOne: Gain 4 Faith.
rulesTwo: You must be Saved.

name: imperialSanction
rulesOne: Gain 1 Faith.
rulesTwo: You must be Emperor or be the same religion as the Emperor.

name: churchPatronage
rulesOne: Convert 1 Gold into 2 Faith.

name: changeDoctrine
rulesOne: Change your Military Doctrine.

name: declareWar
rulesOne: Declare war on a player or a prince that has not been declared war on this round.
rulesTwo: If you declare war on a prince, remove all Influence you have with them.
rulesThree: You must be a German Prince player or a Foreign Power player with a province in the Empire.

name: declareReligiousWar
rulesOne: Declare war against a prince or elector following a heretical religion. Become the Restorer of the Faith (ROTF).
rulesTwo: You must be Saved, in a League, and there must not already be a Religious War.
